channel.title: Skill Cape Emote help and Custom item help
channel.description:
Hey, I need to no if anyone cud post me a short guide on how to add skill cape emotes to my server. And also if anyone cud post a short guide on how to add or create custom items/monsters that wud be great.
no posting saying use google or use tuts.. ive tried alot of stuff and none seem to work for me so i though best way is a 1 on 1.
Thankyou, Jakee :D

item.title: Skill Cape Emote help and Custom item help
item.dc:creator: @jake_93 jake_93
item.description:
@jake_93 wrote:

So could i.
But please do tell me, If someone posts a short guide or a tut… Why are they posting it?
Im pretty certain they are posting it to try and HELP people.
Am i right?

Jake

Read full topic
item.source: Skill Cape Emote help and Custom item help

item.title: Skill Cape Emote help and Custom item help
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Shorthand = u
Slang = gonna

Step by step is not help, since you can copy and and paste. When someone posts a “Short Guide” in a response, they’re going to tell you where and what, but not why or how. Therefore, you learn little to nothing. I could go on all night if you wish.

Read full topic
item.source: Skill Cape Emote help and Custom item help

item.title: Skill Cape Emote help and Custom item help
item.dc:creator: @jake_93 jake_93
item.description:
@jake_93 wrote:

Blah Blah… Short Hand… Slang whatever.
Step by Step on how to do it… Aka HELP?

Whats this copy and paste stuff i provide then?

Read full topic
item.source: Skill Cape Emote help and Custom item help

item.title: Skill Cape Emote help and Custom item help
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

If you’re going to prove me wrong, the correct term is ‘shorthand’

And a “Short Guide” or a “Tut” are step by step on how to do it, and you don’t learn jack shit from the copy and paste criteria you provide.

Read full topic
item.source: Skill Cape Emote help and Custom item help

item.title: Skill Cape Emote help and Custom item help
item.dc:creator: @jake_93 jake_93
item.description:
@jake_93 wrote:

I’m sure that a “Short Guide” and a “Tut” are there to help you, I have searched around and found none on what im looking for hents why i asked for one.
Anything else you wanna try and rant about?
oh and for the record its called slang and if your can’t understand slang then… :\

Thankyou,
Jake

Read full topic
item.source: Skill Cape Emote help and Custom item help

item.title: Skill Cape Emote help and Custom item help
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

It’s so hard to comprehend what you’re rambling on about, since every other word is mispelled.

Why does everyone ask for a ‘short guide’ or a ‘tut’ ? Why not ‘help me’ ? That’s what this section is for.

Read full topic
item.source: Skill Cape Emote help and Custom item help

item.title: Skill Cape Emote help and Custom item help
item.dc:creator: @jake_93 jake_93
item.description:
@jake_93 wrote:

Hmmmmmmmmmmm… ive posted here so i dnt have to make millions of different threads… :\ as i cant ask skillcape emote question there really.

Why cant u just answer my question if u no it… if not dnt post. no need to have a rant is there :S

Read full topic
